Summary: It was moving slowly across the sky as if it were observing me. then it stopped completly. then it just shot off in a flash of light.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my cousins house on my way home. we were just approaching a dirt road when i saw something flashing in the sky. so i decided to stop and look up, and there was a slow moving, shiny, mettalic, object just cruising in the sky. at first i thought to myself " naw thats just an airplane". but i kept seeing the flashes on my way home. So i looked up again, and it was just floating above a cow field, spining in a clockwise motion. then i pointed it out to my cousin and he was speechless. i was astounded. i watch U.F.O Hunters when i can, but i never thought it could really happen. So i decided to take a picture, but my cellphones camera just showed a really bright red light when i aimed at the object. as i was looking at the phone, the object just slowly ascended and just shot of in a flash of light. and as it shot off, i heard a high-pitched ring in my ear. and that was the last i saw it. When i got home, i went to sleep thinking i must be crazy. then i woke up remembering the dream i had. I clearly saw the object was no airplane in the dream. it felt like the dream was real.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Florence
There were no other sightings in Florence on or around August 22nd 2009
